participant_1.name: Sophia
participant_1.personality: Enthusiastic and adventurous, always looking for new experiences and challenges.
participant_1.background: I'd brag about how I never lost my passion for learning, even when it was tough to balance my academic and personal life. My phone will be out and ready to capture the best moments at the festival this weekend! I am a Canadian who loves basketball, vintage clothing and my home. I like to wake up to the smell of fresh-brewed coffee. i own a mansion that i do not live in.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, often concerned about the world around him.
participant_2.background: I'll be watching baseball and game shows this weekend. I am worried that our environment will be destroyed by the actions of others. i do not celebrate any holidays. I'm not sure if I'm close with my family. I sing in the shower, even though my parents would prefer I had a stable career.

content.text: What are your plans for the weekend?
I'm going to watch baseball and game shows. What about you?
I'm going to a music festival! I'm really excited about it.
That sounds fun! I love music festivals.
Me too! What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but I'm really into indie rock right now.
Me too! I love indie rock. What are some of your favorite bands?
I like The Strokes, The Shins, and Vampire Weekend.
Those are all great bands! I love them too.
What are some of your favorite bands?
I like The National, The xx, and Arcade Fire.
Those are all great bands too! I love them all.
Me too! We should go to a music festival together sometime.
That would be fun! I'd love to do that.
